description.narrative: UNICEF and national capacities are strengthened to deliver humanitarian assistance, which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Technical Excellence In Humanitarian Action. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF, the Government and partners adopt improved practices for effectively planning, implementing and monitoring programmes and delivering quality, multi-sectoral and equity focused resuls

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF and national capacities are strengthened to deliver humanitarian assistance

description.narrative: UNICEF continues to deliver quality and effective humanitarian assistance as part of interagency efforts to address acute needs in Somalia, reaching the most vulnerable people affected by crises. Displaced populations have been targeted in priority, with the aim to save lives and provide a protective environment. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
